description: A big man with muscles, wearing a suit and a boxing glove as a belt, holding a woman in his arms. A short woman with blue hair, a red tank top and blue short, on the ground.
text:
Gorila: I caught this little thief red-handed.
Mimi: I swear, I didn't steal anything!

description: The same man, looking away, holding the woman. The woman is desperately looking at another woman in the distance. A tall woman with blue hair, a black leather outfit, a red scarf and a whip in her hand, running away.
text:
Gorila: That woman over there stole something really important.
Mimi: Anya stole something?

description: The muscled man, holding the woman, in front of the woman in the black outfit and the blue hair.
text:
Gorila: There she is!
Anya: What do you want?

description: The muscled man, holding the woman in front of the woman in the black outfit. The man punched the woman in the black outfit. The muscled man starts crying.
text:
Gorila: You stole my grandma's favorite diamond!
Anya: Oh my...

description: The man, holding the woman, looking at the woman in the black outfit. The man is now bigger, and his boxing glove is bigger.
text:
Gorila: Now I'm really angry!
Anya: You dare!

description: The woman in the black outfit, lying on the ground, a lot of police cars and police men around.
